caption.title: Percentage (%) inhibition of protein denaturation by extracts.
caption.p: In the figure different lower case letters (a, b, c, d, e, x, y, z, w, v) in the bars indicates significant differences among means (PË‚0.05). The blue and red colour bars indicate the aqueous and 70% ethanolic extracts, respectively. X-axis denotes the plant name and Y-axis denotes the inhibition percentages of protein denaturation by the extracts (%).
